aboutMe.text: I have been interested in computer technology since my school days and have taught myself a lot of IT skills. In addition, I successfully completed an apprenticeship as a computer scientist EFZ specializing in systems engineering. Since then, I have been working with Windows and am well versed in network technologies and Linux. I have always been enthusiastic about technology. In programming, I have finally found a tool that allows me to actively create something myself—not just consume it. The world is becoming increasingly digital, and programming is a key skill for the future. That's why I am inspired to constantly learn new technologies and tools. I am improving my programming skills so that I can implement my projects even more efficiently, user-friendly, and innovatively. The more I learn, the greater my possibilities become-this motivates me enormously to constantly develop myself further.
aboutMe.location: I live in Zurich. I am open to working on-site or remotely. I am willing to relocate to a specific city or location. It is important to me that I have the opportunity to take such an important step.
aboutMe.openMinded: I am very open-minded and curious when it comes to new technologies. I see every new technology as an opportunity to continuously expand my skills and broaden my horizons. Whether through online courses or personal projects, I regularly work on keeping my skills up to date. This continuous development is what makes the IT world so appealing to me.
aboutMe.description: I see challenges as opportunities, as I can learn something from every problem I encounter. Through analytical thinking, I recognize patterns and often find targeted solutions. Creativity helps me find new solutions when standard methods don't work. Teamwork often leads to particularly efficient and elegant results.

text.eins: Here you will find various front-end technologies that I have used in my projects.
text.zwei: Technologies are constantly evolving-that's exactly what motivates me to always discover and try new things.

myProjects.text: Scroll, click, marvel-discover my projects, test features live, and see for yourself what technology can achieve with creativity.

join.title: Join
join.description: Organize your tasks like a pro with intuitive drag-and-drop, Kanban-inspired boards, and smart user and category assignment. Visual. Dynamic. Efficient. Join Projekt brings structure to your chaos-easily, quickly, and with technical finesse.

polloLoco.title: Pollo Loco
polloLoco.description: An action-packed jump-and-run game in object-oriented style: Collect coins and bottles, equip your Mexican hero, and face the ultimate showdown against the dreaded killer chicken!

pokedex.title: Pokédex
pokedex.description: Welcome to the Pokédex Project-an interactive application that uses the powerful PokéAPI to retrieve, analyze, and visualize real Pokémon data in real time. With this API as its technological backbone, the result is a digital reference work that will delight Pokémon fans and developers alike-fast, dynamic, and brimming with Poké knowledge.

dabubble.title: DA Bubble
dabubble.description: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

simplecrm.title: simpleCRM
simplecrm.description: A very Simple Customer Relationship Management system working with CRUD functionality.

johannes.name: Johannes Singl - Team Partner
johannes.feedback: Working with Lea on our project was fantastic. With her creativity, technical expertise, and solution-oriented approach, she contributed significantly to its success. Her positive attitude and ability to work well in a team made the work not only productive but also enjoyable.

text.eins: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Show that you will add value to their projects through your work.
text.zwei: Need a Frontend developer? Contact me!

privacy.drei: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

subheader.drei: Scope and ownership of the product

content.zwei: By accessing and using Portfolio (Product), you acknowledge and agree to the following terms and conditions, and any policies, guidelines, or amendments thereto that may be presented to you from time to time. content.drei: Portfolio has been developed as part of a student group project in a web development bootcamp at the Developer Akademie GmbH. It has an educational purpose and is not intended for extensive personal & business usage. As such, we cannot guarantee consistent availability, reliability, accuracy, or any other aspect of quality regarding this Product. The design of Portfolio is owned by the Developer Akademie GmbH. Unauthorized use, reproduction, modification, distribution, or replication of the design is strictly prohibited.
content.vier: Aside from the design owned by Developer Akademie GmbH, we, the listed students, retain all proprietary rights in Portfolio, including any associated copyrighted material, trademarks, and other proprietary information.
content.fuenf: Portfolio is intended to be used for lawful purposes only, in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations. Any use of Portfolio for illegal activities, or to harass, harm, threaten, or intimidate another person, is strictly prohibited. You are solely responsible for your interactions with other users of Portfolio.
content.sechs: Portfolio is provided as is without warranty of any kind, whether express or implied, including but not limited to the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. In no event will we, the listed students, or the Developer Akademie, be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential or exemplary damages, including but not limited to, damages for loss of profits, goodwill, use, data, or other intangible losses, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages, arising out of or in connection with the use or performance of Portfolio.
content.sieben: You agree to indemnify, defend and hold harmless us, the listed students, the Developer Akademie, and our affiliates, partners, officers, directors, agents, and employees, from and against any claim, demand, loss, damage, cost, or liability (including reasonable legal fees) arising out of or relating to your use of Portfolio and/or your breach of this Legal Notice.
